headline: Alcon Stock Might Rise as Clareon Vivity IOL Secures CE Mark Approval
summary: ALC secures CE Mark for Clareon Vivity IOL, bringing advanced presbyopia-correcting lens technology to Europe, enhancing visual outcomes with cutting-edge innovation.

headline: ALC Stock Rises Following the Merger Agreement With LENSAR
summary: Alcon enters into a definitive merger agreement to acquire LENSAR's ALLY Robotic Cataract Laser Treatment System, proprietary Streamline software technology and LENSAR legacy laser system.

headline: Cardinal Health to Announce Third-Quarter Results for Fiscal Year 2025 on May 1
summary: Cardinal Health (NYSE: CAH) plans to release third-quarter financial results for its fiscal year 2025 on May 1, prior to the opening of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The company will webcast a discussion of these results beginning at 8:30 a.m. Eastern.
